name: DATE_ADD
description: Adds a specified time interval to a date.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Time unit (YEAR, QUARTER, MONTH, WEEK, DAY, HOUR, MINUTE, SECOND)

examples.title: Add days
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY) as next_week

examples.title: Add months
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_ADD(created_at, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) as renewal_date FROM subscriptions

examples.title: Add hours
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_ADD(HOUR, 2, start_time) as end_time FROM events

notes: Supported units: SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR
